comments.text:
When I paste a piece of spreadsheet from OpenOffice into a new mail, it does get converted nicely into an HTML table.

Unfortunately, any characters, that were struck-through (crossed-out) in the spreadsheet, appear normal in the e-mail. I have to go to Format->Text Style->Strikethrough manually to re-apply the formatting I've already applied while in OpenOffice.

comments.text:
Joe, pasting /anything/ would show it. Create a 2x2 table (A1, B1, A2, B2) with values (1, 2, 3, 4), select the four cells, then copy and paste them into composer.

You will get a 2x2 table in the composer, but whatever text you had in the message already will shrink down.
